remarks: Sufficient condition for elementhood in the set of polynomials. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jul-2014.)
statement:
elplyd.1 $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
elplyd.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
elplyd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ) -> A e. S ) $.
elplyd $p |- ( ph -> ( z e. CC |-> sum_ k e. ( 0 ... N ) ( A x. ( z ^ k ) ) ) e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
$d A z $.
$d N k z $.
$d S k z $.
$d k ph z $.
